title: NASA Artemis II Crew Prepares for Historic Lunar Flyby
recap: NASA's Artemis II astronauts are rehearsing key procedures ahead of their 2025 lunar mission, marking the first crewed flight of Orion around the Moon.
bodyPlain: NASA is advancing its preparations for Artemis II, the first crewed mission in the agency’s Artemis campaign to establish a long-term presence on and around the Moon...
html: NASA is advancing its preparations for Artemis II, the first crewed mission...

title: SpaceX Starship Completes Full-Stack Wet Dress Rehearsal
recap: SpaceX has achieved another milestone with a successful full-stack wet dress rehearsal for Starship ahead of its next test flight.
bodyPlain: SpaceX conducted a complete fueling test of Starship and its Super Heavy booster at Starbase, marking the final step before the vehicle’s integrated flight...
html: SpaceX conducted a complete fueling test of Starship and its Super Heavy booster...
